MajorClaims.Text: any great success need great work not great luck

Claims.Text: luck is one factor in reaching goal
famous people are usually diligent people not lucky people
we cannot always lean on our luck to be successful
The most fortunate people in the word cannot manufacture an automobile or build a high tower just by her or his chance

Premises.Text: its impact is extraneous and we must not reckon on luck in our plans
He do a lot of exercise in football field every day
it is not for which he is luckier than me
Hard work make you a professional man/woman which are powerful in his or her job
when you work hard you decrease portion of chance in your success
in football game it is said that penalty-kick need good chance to be goal
Statically the chance of being goal is fifty-fifty
But I think Ronaldo make a goal from a penalty-kick with more possibility than me
It is not for which Ronaldo is more fortune than me
Definitely it is for which he have more practice and exercise than me
it is wise advice which you have hard study to success on exam
If you pick up any choice by chance you would fail the exam
You cannot prepare for it without any study and Rely on your luck, even if you be a very lucky
you prepare for TOEFL or other multiple-choice test which has four option to choose in every question
I don't want to disavow the role of luck in success, but as you know it hardly accompany us
you have to work hard to learn and to get a lot of information before doing a project in good way
These plans is done by someone who is mastered in his/her work
such people do work hard and have great experiences because of their hard works
